column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////3.5 stars-- came in for lunch because it was new and had pretty good ratings. Our waiter was very friendly and attentive
column2: and explained that Bosscat is actually from LA and this is a new Houston location. We ordered the shrimp & grits and short rib. Portions are pretty small
column3: especially because I generally think of "heavy
column4: filling" meals when it comes to shrimp & grits and short rib.
